explanation: [0-0] On the stairs inside a room, a young man wearing a black top and khaki pants stands facing forward, his right hand holding a large water bottle and his left hand holding a small water bottle, looking down with his head lowered. The walls are white, and sunlight shines through the window behind the man. The stairs have a yellow railing.

[0-2] He then spins and throws the large water bottle in his right hand. The large water bottle lands upright on the floor below. Immediately afterward, he spins and throws the small water bottle in his left hand. The small water bottle lands upside down on the cap of the large water bottle. The black English subtitles "Too Easy" and an ellipsis appear on a white background, then disappear.

[0-2] He then spins and throws the large water bottle in his right hand. The large water bottle lands upright on the floor below. Immediately afterward, he spins and throws the small water bottle in his left hand. The small water bottle lands upside down on the cap of the large water bottle. The black English subtitles "Too Easy" and an ellipsis appear on a white background, then disappear.

[2-8] Then the screen switches, the man holds a large water bottle in each hand, he spins both hands and throws the bottles simultaneously. The two large water bottles land upright on the floor. Then he bends down, picks up a small water bottle in each hand, moves his body slightly to the right, spins both hands simultaneously and throws the small water bottles out. The two small water bottles land upside down on top of the two large water bottle caps, and the man looks down with his mouth wide open in surprise. Black subtitles "Like and Sub" on a white background and a yellow emoji with a cloud above its head appear on the screen.
